rule.name: CASE_APP_uiGetTaskAuditTrailForProcess
rule.definition: =load( local!gridPI1:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1,10,#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field:"c5")), local!gridPI2:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1,10,#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field:"c5")), with( local!currentTasks:a!queryProcessAnalytics( report:#"_a-0000da5f-caaa-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2936", contextProcessIds:{ri!processId}, query:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"( pagingInfo:local!gridPI1 ) ), local!taskHistory:a!queryProcessAnalytics( report:#"_a-0000da5f-caaa-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2937", contextProcessIds:{ri!processId}, query:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"( pagingInfo:local!gridPI2 ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label:"Current Tasks and Task Audit Trail", firstColumnContents:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label:"Current Tasks", totalCount:local!currentTasks.totalCount, columns:apply( #"_a-0000da5f-caaa-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2897"(columnConfig:_, data:local!currentTasks.data, showLink:true), local!currentTasks.columnConfigs ), value:local!gridPI1, saveInto:local!gridPI1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label:"Completed Tasks History", totalCount:local!taskHistory.totalCount, columns:apply( #"_a-0000da5f-caaa-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2897"(columnConfig:_, data:local!taskHistory.data, showLink:false), local!taskHistory.columnConfigs ), value:local!gridPI2, saveInto:local!gridPI2 ) }, isCollapsible:true ) ) )
